deck:
We're looking for the right person to join our staff team and take on the responsibility of leading our work with young people in the church and wider community.

You can download the Job Description and Person Specification here.

The Application Form is here.

Applications must be emailed to caleb@gatewaychurch.co.uk or handed in to the Gateway Centre office by 9am on Monday 27th March 2017.

Interviews will be held in the week commencing 3rd April.
subtitle: We're looking for a new Youth Work Team Leader. Could it be you?
title: We're recruiting...
